mapper.select: select id, subscribe, openid, language, subscribe_time, unionid, remark, groupid, subscribe_scene, qr_scene, qr_scene_str, tagid_list from wx_users

select id, subscribe, openid, language, subscribe_time, unionid, remark, groupid, subscribe_scene, qr_scene, qr_scene_str, tagid_list from wx_users a where openid in (select b.openid from wx_users_bind_sign b where b.tag_id = 1)
